overview.title: MEMEPUMP
overview.description: MEMEPUMP is a community-driven memecoin platform on Solana, offering a groundbreaking trading and earning experience through DeFi incentives and decentralized governance.

hybridDefi.title: Hybrid DeFi + Simulated Trading
hybridDefi.description: A unique ecosystem combining real trading with risk-free simulation markets.

globalExpansion.title: Global Expansion Focus
globalExpansion.description: Aggressive marketing and partnerships to ensure long-term growth.

communityRewards.title: 55% Community Rewards
communityRewards.description: The largest share of tokens goes directly to users via trading incentives, staking, and engagement.

daoGovernance.title: DAO-Ready Governance
daoGovernance.description: A portion of reserves is allocated for future decentralized decision-making.

exchangeToken.title: Exchange token
exchangeToken.description: MMP and MPB are two pioneering exchange-issued coins that represent a breakthrough in the world of Web3 and decentralized platforms. Built on Solana, they are not just liquidity tokens but also tools for creating value and opportunities for the community, aiming to establish a sustainable and powerful ecosystem.

tokenomics.title: TOKENOMICS
tokenomics.description: MMP and MPB represent the next generation of exchange-issued tokens, pioneering a revolutionary approach to Web3 and decentralized finance. Built on Solana's lightning-fast blockchain, these tokens transcend traditional liquidity roles to become powerful catalysts for community-driven value creation. They serve as the foundation for a comprehensive ecosystem that rewards early adopters, incentivizes long-term participation, and establishes sustainable growth mechanisms through innovative DeFi protocols and community governance.
tokenomics.seedRoundDescription: Used for platform development and initial investment activities.
tokenomics.communityRewardsDescription: Distributed through airdrops, promotional activities, and rewards for participants.
tokenomics.liquidityFundDescription: Used to collaborate with Pump.fun to provide liquidity and develop investment strategies.
tokenomics.marketingPartnershipDescription: 10 billion tokens allocated for marketing strategy and partner development.
tokenomics.operationalCostsDescription: 5 billion tokens allocated for operational costs of the development team (locked for 2 years).
tokenomics.reserveFundDescription: Retained for DAO activities to ensure flexibility and long-term development of the platform.

communityRewards.title: Community Rewards
communityRewards.description: Rewards distributed to active community members

developmentFund.title: Development Fund
developmentFund.description: Funding for ongoing development and improvements

roadmap.title: Road Map
roadmap.description: The MEMEPUMP project is structured around a dynamic, phased roadmap designed to ensure a steady expansion of our ecosystem while consistently integrating community feedback and promoting innovation. Below is an outline of our planned milestones

phase1.title: Phase 1
phase1.subtitle: Foundation & Launch (Q2 2025)
items: Product Finalization
White Paper & Community Building
Pre-Launch Token Distribution

phase2.title: Phase 2
phase2.subtitle: Official Launch & Early Growth (Q3 2025)
items: Mainnet Launch
Token Distribution
Initial Market Integration

phase3.title: Phase 3
phase3.subtitle: Ecosystem Expansion & Feature Development (Q4 2025 - Q1 2026)
items: Enhanced Liquidity & Simulation Modules
Stake & Premium Services Launch
Global Outreach

phase4.title: Phase 4
phase4.subtitle: Decentralized Governance & Long-Term Innovation (Q2 2026 and Beyond)
items: DAO Transition
Cross-Chain Integrations
Continuous Feature Enhancements
Community Initiatives

networkFee.message:
When swapping, a Solana network fee ({fee}) will be incurred.
It is recommended to purchase directly in SOL.
networkFee.recommendation: It is recommended to purchase directly in SOL.
networkFee.firstTimeFee:
For the first IDO purchase, a network fee of approximately 0.0025 SOL is required for ATA creation.
After additional purchases, the network fee per swap is reduced to approximately 0.00005 SOL.

swap.guildDescription: Join our exclusive guild system to unlock premium features, earn rewards, and connect with other traders. Guild members enjoy reduced fees, priority support, and exclusive trading opportunities.
policyItems: Users can transfer SOL, USDT, or USDC directly from their personal wallets (Phantom) into their exchange wallet.
They can use SOL, USDT, or USDC to swap for MMP tokens at the IDO price of $0.001.
Users may stake MMP to earn periodic rewards (reward details are currently being updated).
If they choose not to stake, they can withdraw MMP/MPB from their exchange wallet back to their personal wallet, paying only the network fee.
When withdrawing SOL, USDT, or USDC from the exchange wallet to a personal wallet, a flat $1 withdrawal fee applies.

seedRound.title: Seed Round (6%): 6 billion tokens are distributed in the seed round, primarily used for platform development and initial investment activities.

communityRewards.title: Community Rewards (55%): 55 billion tokens, representing 55% of the total issuance, are distributed to the community through Airdrop, promotions, and participant reward activities.

liquidityFund.title: Liquidity and Investment Simulation Fund (18%): 18 billion tokens are used for liquidity provision and investment strategy development through partnership with Pump.fun.

marketingPartnership.title: Marketing and Partnerships (10%): 10 billion tokens are used for marketing strategies and partnership development.

operationalCosts.title: Operational Costs / Team (5%): 5 billion tokens are allocated for operational expenses for the development team, with a 2-year holding period set.

reserveFund.title: Reserve Fund (6%): 6 billion tokens are maintained as a reserve fund for DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) activities. This ensures platform flexibility and sustainability.

goalsLaunch.title: Goals and Launch Plan
goalsLaunch.content: This project aims to acquire 10 million users by July 2027. Additionally, it targets a full launch in July 2025, and is currently in beta stage, receiving great interest from the community.

whyChooseMMP.title: Why Choose MMP Coin?
whyChooseMMP.content:
Market Potential
MMP will maximize the potential of the cryptocurrency market, especially the community rewards market. By 2025, this market is expected to account for 55% of total trading value, and MemePump will play a crucial role at the center of this growth. MMP will provide a promising Web3 ecosystem for users to participate in.

strongGrowth.title: Strong Growth Potential
strongGrowth.content: MMP's value has the potential to rise from 0.001 USD/token to 0.328 USD/token, providing excellent profit opportunities for investors. According to projections, when daily trading volume reaches between 10 million and 300 million dollars, MMP's value can increase by 328 times.

beginnerFriendly.title: Beginner-Friendly
beginnerFriendly.content: MMP is designed with a user-friendly interface, suitable even for users new to the cryptocurrency market. Through tools like TradingView and Solana ecosystem integration, users can easily participate and have a seamless experience.

investmentBenefits.title: Benefits of Investing in MMP
investmentBenefits.content:
MMP is not just an investment opportunity but also provides long-term benefits:
Flexible Investment: MMP can be purchased in any amount at 0.001 USD/token, providing an ideal opportunity for small investors who want to participate in the cryptocurrency market with small amounts.

flexibleInvestment.title: Flexible Investment
flexibleInvestment.content: MMP can be purchased in any amount at 0.001 USD/token, providing an ideal opportunity for small investors who want to participate in the cryptocurrency market with small amounts.

highGrowthPotential.title: High Growth Potential
highGrowthPotential.content: When MMP achieves 300 million dollars in daily trading volume, its value can rise to 0.328 USD/token, bringing 328 times profit compared to the initial price.

airdropBenefits.title: Airdrop Benefits
airdropBenefits.content: Those holding MPB (MemePump Bonus) can receive 18% annually and 1.5% monthly Airdrop benefits for 2 years.

limitedOpportunity.title: Limited Investment Opportunity
limitedOpportunity.content:
First sale until July 31, 2025 at price 0.001 dollars. Second sale undetermined, minimum 0.002 dollars starting~
A 3 million dollar seed round closes, providing great opportunities for early investors.

tokenValueAppreciation.title: Token Value Appreciation Potential
tokenValueAppreciation.content: Applying the MPB multiplier system, MMP's value can increase from 0.001 USD/token to 0.328 USD/token, a 328-fold increase. This provides an opportunity to invest in new cryptocurrencies and expect significant returns.

mmpInvestmentAdvantage.title: MMP Investment Advantage
mmpInvestmentAdvantage.content: With just 1,000 USD investment, you can purchase 1 million tokens, and when MMP's token sales revenue reaches 300 million dollars, you can achieve massive profits.

visionConclusion.title: Vision and Conclusion
visionConclusion.content:
MMP is not just a simple cryptocurrency but an important part of the meme coin and Web3 ecosystem. Through sustainable growth and clear investment strategy,
MMP is expected to achieve 3.28 billion dollars in value by 2028. Investing in MMP provides an opportunity to profit from market growth while participating in a rapidly growing community.

callToAction.title: Join MemePump now and don't miss the 328-fold value appreciation opportunity!

projectDescriptions.mmpProjectIntro: MemePump (MMP) is an innovative project providing new liquidity tokens in the cryptocurrency world, especially in Web3 and decentralized platforms. MMP is not just a simple cryptocurrency but a tool that creates value and opportunities for the community, aiming to build a strong and sustainable ecosystem. Built on the Solana network built on a network, MemePump aims to change the way users interact and engage in the cryptocurrency space.
projectDescriptions.mmpProjectOverview:
MemePump (MMP) Project Overview
MMP is designed as a liquidity token for the MemePump platform, with a total issuance of 100 billion tokens. MMP is not just a meme coin but is used as a liquidity token for community rewards and trading within this ecosystem. Token issuance and distribution are carried out according to clear and transparent strategies to provide maximum benefits to the community and investors.
projectDescriptions.mpbProjectDescription: **MemePump (MPB)** is an innovative project within a decentralized Web3 ecosystem based on the Solana platform. This project provides high returns to investors, and in the future, through MPB Coin, a coin with strong growth potential, it will provide dividends and profits, offering long-term benefits to investors.

projectOverview.title: Project Overview
projectOverview.content:
Project Name: MemePump (MPB Coin)
Project Value: 10 million dollars
Issuance Ratio: 30% (3 million dollars for investor dividends)
Issued Tokens: 1 billion MPB tokens (30% for investors, 70% for platform development fund)
Investment Target: 3 million dollars
Launch Schedule: Official launch expected in July 2025 (currently in beta version)

marketPotential.title: Market Potential
marketPotential.content: MemePump is not a simple cryptocurrency project but a decentralized Web3 platform based on Solana's powerful blockchain technology. This project aims for 300 million dollars in revenue by 2028, and MPB Coin will play an important role within the platform, providing strong returns to investors.

investmentBenefits.title: Investment Benefits
investmentBenefits.content:
MemePump offers unique investment opportunities with high returns:
Expected Dividend Rewards (Voting in Progress): Based on coin holdings (amount held), through voting on company revenue, annual 1% ~ up to 300 million dollars in revenue achievement can lead to 2,190% return on investment.
Flexible Investment: Start with minimum 1 dollar and gradually increase investment amount.
MMP Coin Airdrop: By holding MPB Coin, you can get MMP Coin airdrop opportunities providing 1.5% monthly interest and 18% annual bonus.

growthOpportunities.title: Growth and Opportunities
growthOpportunities.content:
MemePump aims for sustainable development, planning to achieve 300 million dollars in revenue by 2028. Additionally, MPB Coin offers the following opportunities:
MPB token value is expected to rise from 0.001 dollars to 0.3285 dollars, representing approximately 328-fold growth potential.
Expected Revenue: Growing from 100,000 dollars in 2025 to 300 million dollars in 2028. High Liquidity: MPB Coin can be easily traded on blockchain platforms, allowing investors to easily withdraw funds when needed.

investmentHolding.title: Investment (Coin Holding)
investmentHolding.content:
MemePump offers opportunities for everyone from small investors to large investors. This project with high returns and strong growth potential is worth participating in right now.
Flexible Investment: Start with minimum 1 dollar and gradually increase investment amount.
Attractive Profit Opportunities: With 2,190% dividend rewards and airdrop opportunities, MPB Coin holders can achieve substantial returns.
Long-term Growth Potential: MemePump aims for significant growth by 2028, and MPB Coin value will greatly increase.
Invest in MemePump (MPB) now and don't miss 2025's best investment opportunity! Join the Web3 ecosystem transformation with MemePump and become a successful investor of the future!

limitedInvestmentOpportunity.content:

stake.title: Stake MMP
stake.description: Stake your MMP tokens to earn rewards. The longer you stake, the more you earn.
stake.friendReferralDescription: Users who introduce friends to stake will earn an additional 5-10% of the referred user's rewards. This approach expands the user network and promotes community engagement.
stake.stakerLeaderboardDescription: A ranking system based on staking amount and duration will reward top stakers with weekly or monthly prizes (e.g., the top staker receives 1,000 $MMP).
stake.earlyStakingDescription: Early adopters receive a bonus of 10-30% as a limited-time offer.
stake.miniGameDescription: Upon staking 1,000 tokens or when unlocking a stake, users earn an opportunity to spin a wheel for random prizes.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction: What is MEMEPUMP?
introduction.description: MEMEPUMP is a next-generation community-driven meme coin platform built on the Solana blockchain, born to revolutionize how users trade, generate profits, and participate in meme-based cryptocurrencies. Unlike existing meme projects lacking utility, MEMEPUMP integrates DeFi incentives, simulation trading ecosystem, and decentralized governance to provide all participants with a sustainable and rewarding experience.

problems.title: Problems: Challenges in the Meme Coin Market
problems.description: The meme coin market is suffering from the following issues:
items: High volatility and fraud risk ‚Äì Many projects lack transparency and operate through pump and dump schemes.
Low user rewards ‚Äì Most platforms prioritize whales over the community.
Lack of long-term utility ‚Äì Most meme coins disappear after the initial hype.

solutions.title: MEMEPUMP's Solutions
solutions.description: We solve these problems in the following ways:
items: 55% Community Rewards Allocation ‚Äì The largest token ratio is distributed to users, rewarding trading incentives, staking, and platform participation.
Hybrid DeFi + Simulation Trading ‚Äì Provides an innovative ecosystem combining real trading with risk-free simulation markets.
DAO-based Governance Preparation ‚Äì Allocates some tokens as reserves for future decentralized decision-making.
Global Expansion Strategy ‚Äì Drives long-term growth through aggressive marketing and partnerships.

problems.title: 2. Problems: Confusion in the Meme Coin Investment Market
problems.description: While the meme coin market is experiencing explosive popularity, it still resembles a high-risk, high-reward gambling den where most investors lose money. Why?

rugPull.title: 2.1. Fraud and Rug Pull
items: Over 90% of new meme coins disappear or are fraudulent projects immediately after launch.
Investors are exposed to irresponsible risks such as fake liquidity, insider dumping, and rug pulls.

unfairDistribution.title: 2.2. Unfair Distribution Structure
items: Most meme coins are designed to favor whales and insiders, with regular investors receiving only small allocations.
Pump and dump schemes are dominant, making sustainable growth potential very low.

lackOfUtility.title: 2.3. Lack of Practical Utility
items: Many meme coins are merely speculative targets with no real purpose or functionality.
There is only volatility dependent on over-hyped advertising without ecosystem or reward systems.

informationOverload.title: 2.4. Information Overload and Misinformation
items: New meme coins are launched every minute, making it impossible to identify legitimate projects.
Fake influencers promote fraudulent projects, leading investors down the wrong path.

entryBarriers.title: 2.5. Entry Barriers for Safe Trading
items: Most meme coin trading occurs through unverified DEXs with insufficient security.
There are no safety measures like scam detection, smart contract verification, or whale tracking.

memepumpSolutions.title: 2.6. MEMEPUMP's Solutions
items: Community-First Rewards ‚Äì 55% of total tokens are distributed directly to users, not insiders.
Rug Pull Prevention ‚Äì Only verified tokens are listed, ensuring safe launch with multi-signature vaults.
Simulation Trading + Real Trading DeFi ‚Äì Learn in a risk-free environment before real trading.
Transparent Global Operations ‚Äì Achieves fair and decentralized decision-making through DAO governance.

dataInsights.title: 3.1 Gaining Insights from Data
dataInsights.description: The meme coin market moves based on viral trends, community enthusiasm, and real-time sentiment. However, without structured data, investors get lost in information noise. MEMEPUMP solves this by integrating multi-chain analysis, social sentiment analysis, and on-chain behavior to provide practical insights.

whyNewParadigm.title: Why Do Meme Coins Need a New Data Paradigm?
whyNewParadigm.description: Most platforms treat meme coins like regular assets, overlooking their unique characteristics:
items: Ultra-high volatility: Prices can skyrocket or crash by 1000% in just hours, moving based on tweets, memes, and influencer impact.
Low transparency: There are almost no tools to track rug pulls, liquidity changes, and whale dumping in real-time.
Community-centric: Success depends more on participation metrics like Telegram/Discord activity and meme spreadability than fundamentals.

dataFramework.title: MEMEPUMP's Data Framework
dataFramework.description: We restructure meme coin data into 5 core sections to provide useful information for traders, degens, and builders:

marketDashboard.title: 1. Meme Market Dashboard
items: Real-time trends: Pumping coins, volume spikes, social mentions (X, Telegram, 4chan).
Rug pull radar: AI-scanned contract risk factors (e.g., minting functions, LP lock status) and liquidity warnings.
New launches: Chain-filtered (Solana, Base, Ethereum), fair launch indicators.

sectorIndex.title: 2. Meme Sectors & Indexes
sectorIndex.description: Meme coins are not one type. We classify them by the following criteria:
items: Sub-categories: Doge family, political, celebrity, AI-generated, etc.
Chain ecosystems: Solana, Ethereum, Base comparisons.
Community strength: Holder count, influencer support.
sectorIndex.example: Example: Capture market rotation opportunities through "Solana Doge Coin Index."

tokenAnalysis.title: 3. Token and Project Deep Analysis
tokenAnalysis.description: For each meme coin, MEMEPUMP tracks:
items: Tokenomics: Whether it's a fair launch, team allocation, tax structure, etc.
Viral potential: Social growth rate, meme template spreadability.
Whale activity monitoring: Major holders' buy/sell movements.

alphaNews.title: 4. Alpha Leaks & News
items: Meme news integration: Major news collected from crypto Twitter, Substack, degen channels.
AI-aligned sentiment analysis: Bullish vs FUD trends by coin.
Event alerts: Major exchange listings, influencer promotions, meme contests, etc.

onchainTrading.title: 5. On-chain and Simulation Trading
items: LP status monitoring: Detect fund outflows or suspicious withdrawals from liquidity pools
Paper trading laboratory: Test meme coin strategies risk-free before real investment

onchainUpdate.title: 5.1 On-chain Trading Update
onchainUpdate.description: MEMEPUMP's on-chain trading features are constantly evolving to provide the best trading experience. We've added:
items: Real-time market analysis: AI-powered insights for every coin
Personalized watchlists: Tailored to your trading style
onchainUpdate.content: This update enhances MEMEPUMP's on-chain trading features, making it more intuitive and efficient for traders.

aiEnabled.title: 3.2 AI Makes It Possible (MEMEPUMP Edition)
aiEnabled.description: If meme coins symbolize the democratization of crypto speculation markets, AI is the equalizing device that transforms chaos into insights. MEMEPUMP uses AI to remove noise and provide real-time insights, fraud detection, and personalized trading strategies ‚Äî available for free, unlike traditional platforms charging over $30,000 annually for Bloomberg-level data.

howAIChanges.title: How MEMEPUMP's AI Changes Meme Coin Trading

dataAnalysis.title: 1. AI-Based Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Meme coin movements are at the speed of light. MEMEPUMP's AI scans the following in real-time:
items: Over 10,000 social mentions per hour (X, Telegram, 4chan) to detect hype cycles
Smart contract risk analysis (honeypots, mint functions, LP locks, etc.) ‚Äì 98% accuracy
Cross-chain whale wallet tracking (Solana, Base, Ethereum) ‚Äì pump/dump detection
dataAnalysis.notification: Real-time alerts: Push notifications for sudden volume spikes, influencer promotions, rug pull signs

marketPrediction.title: 2. Market Prediction Analysis
marketPrediction.description: Traditional technical analysis (TA) doesn't fit meme coins well. MEMEPUMP's AI analyzes:
items: Meme viral scores (meme template spread, participation speed, etc.)
Past pump patterns (e.g., "Doge coin pumps after Elon tweets")
Community sentiment changes (FOMO vs FUD real-time analysis)
marketPrediction.briefing: Daily AI briefing: Send TOP meme coin watchlist to inbox with 30-second voice summary

aiAssistant.title: 3. Your Personal Degenerate AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Meet now ‚Äî MEME-GPT, your 24-hour meme coin trading copilot:
items: Portfolio tracking: "Why did $PEPE crash? Show me whale wallet movements."
Alpha leaks: "Find meme coins under $1M market cap trending on crypto Twitter."
Paper trading simulation: Test strategies risk-free through AI-generated scenarios
aiAssistant.watchlist: Custom watchlist reports: e.g., "Among my watched coins, $WIF up 40%, $BONK trending in Vietnam"

aiAssistantUpdate.title: 3.3 AI Assistant Update
aiAssistantUpdate.description: MEME-GPT is constantly evolving to provide the best trading experience. We've added:
items: Real-time market analysis: AI-powered insights for every coin
Personalized watchlists: Tailored to your trading style
aiAssistantUpdate.content: This update enhances MEME-GPT's functionality, making it more intuitive and efficient for traders.

governance.title: Decentralized Governance
governance.description: MEMEPUMP token holders can influence critical decisions in platform development. They can directly propose, discuss, and vote on various matters including protocol upgrades, parameter adjustments, and new feature launches. This decentralized governance model ensures complete transparency and aligns all changes with community interests.

incentiveStructure.title: Ecosystem Incentive Structure
incentiveStructure.description: MEMEPUMP tokens are the core incentive mechanism of the platform and activate the ecosystem in the following ways:
items: Participation rewards: MEMEPUMP tokens are distributed daily to users actively engaging in trading, community activities, and content sharing.
Liquidity & Simulation incentives: Users contributing to real trading liquidity pools or participating in simulation investment ecosystems receive rewards.
Content and data accuracy bounties: Members who discover or fix data errors or contribute useful content are rewarded with MEMEPUMP tokens.

incentiveStructureUpdate.title: Ecosystem Incentive Structure Update
incentiveStructureUpdate.description: MEMEPUMP tokens are the core incentive mechanism of the platform and activate the ecosystem in the following ways:
items: Participation rewards: MEMEPUMP tokens are distributed daily to users actively engaging in trading, community activities, and content sharing.
Liquidity & Simulation incentives: Users contributing to real trading liquidity pools or participating in simulation investment ecosystems receive rewards.
Content and data accuracy bounties: Members who discover or fix data errors or contribute useful content are rewarded with MEMEPUMP tokens.

incentiveStructureUpdate2.title: Staking for Premium Features
items: In addition to basic incentives, users who stake MEMEPUMP tokens can access various premium features:
Users who stake a certain amount of MEMEPUMP tokens will have access to advanced analytics tools, exclusive content, transaction fee discounts in SSI Protocol, and other additional services.

seedRound.title: 1. Seed Round (6%)
seedRound.description: Allocated to strategic early investors who provided essential support in the project's initial stages.

vesting.title: Vesting Schedule:
items: Phase 1: 50% of total allocation is released sequentially starting 30 days before exchange listing.
Phase 2: Remaining 50% is released after 3 months post-listing.

communityRewards.title: 2. Community Rewards (55%)
communityRewards.description: The core of MEMEPUMP is a community-centered ecosystem. Over half of total issuance is allocated as rewards to encourage user participation.

vesting.title: Vesting Schedule:
items: Initial release: 15% is released at TGE (Token Generation Event).
Subsequent distribution: Remaining 85% is distributed linearly over 60 months, encouraging long-term holding and sustained community participation.

liquidityPool.title: 3. Ecosystem Liquidity & Simulation Pool (18%)
liquidityPool.description: This allocation is set to simultaneously strengthen real trading liquidity and simulation ecosystems.
liquidityPool.vesting: Vesting Schedule: Tokens are released progressively each month over 36 months in a linear manner.

marketingPartnership.title: 4. Marketing & Partnerships (10%)
marketingPartnership.description: For global expansion and strategic partnership acquisition, 10% of total tokens are allocated to marketing activities, influencer collaborations, and various partnership-based initiatives.
marketingPartnership.vesting: Vesting Schedule: Tokens begin releasing after an 18-month cliff period. Thereafter, tokens are distributed progressively each month over 36 months.

teamOperations.title: 5. Team & Operations (5%)
teamOperations.description: This allocation supports the core development team and ongoing platform development and operations.

vesting.title: Vesting Schedule:
items: Vesting begins 3 months after official platform launch.
Distributed monthly over 6 years in the following structure:
Years 1-2: Approximately 2.2% monthly
Years 3-4: Approximately 1.4% monthly
Years 5-6: Approximately 0.57% monthly

reserveFund.title: 6. Foundation Reserve (6%)
reserveFund.description: This allocation is held as strategic emergency funds, supporting unexpected situation responses, future development, and smooth transition to DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) governance systems.

vesting.title: Vesting Schedule:
items: Initial release: 15% released at TGE (Token Generation Event)
Ongoing release: Remaining tokens distributed linearly over 60 months

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.description: This whitepaper describes an airdrop program directly integrated into the main website. This program encourages community participation through various tasks and interactions, allowing users to accumulate Experience Points (EXP) and convert them to project tokens later.

channels.title: Main Channels
channels.description: Users can log in through Gmail and Telegram. (Discord is optional and omitted if not supported.)

socialParticipation.title: Required Social Participation
socialParticipation.description: To receive rewards, users must join all designated social channels. This condition ensures complete integration with the community.

tasks.title: 3. Tasks and EXP Accumulation
tasks.description: The airdrop program is centered around daily tasks and SNS activities, encouraging active participation through EXP.
items: Daily check-in: Users must visit the airdrop page on the website daily to check in.
Social media participation: Liking, sharing, and commenting on latest Twitter posts earns predetermined EXP for each activity.
Content sharing: Users upload posts to their social media, including username tags or designated hashtags: #memepump, #memepump_exchanges, #PumpWithMemePump.

distribution.title: 4. Airdrop Distribution Criteria
distribution.description: Airdrop rewards are calculated based on total Experience Points (EXP) accumulated through tasks, and this EXP is converted to project tokens. To receive rewards, all of the following conditions must be met:
requirements: Social network participation: Must join official Telegram channels. Must follow official Twitter channels.
Sustained participation: Must complete 15 consecutive days of check-ins. Must be actively engaged for at least one month.
Community contribution: Must achieve minimum referral count set by the project. Must connect all required social accounts.
distribution.conclusion: Through these criteria, airdrop rewards are distributed only to community members who actively participate and are dedicated to the project.

rewards.title: 1. APY and Reward Structure
items: Premium APY rates
Competitive high-yield APY:
3 months: 10%
6 months: 22%
9 months: 34%
12 months: 48%
24 months: 130%
Flexible adjustment: APY may be adjusted dynamically depending on platform operation or TVL (Total Value Locked) to ensure stable ecosystem growth.

mechanism.title: 2. Staking Mechanism
items: Long-term and large stakers benefit: Users who stake for a long period or a large amount receive various benefits such as airdrops of newly listed tokens, extra rewards in USDT or other tokens.
Staking procedure: Users deposit tokens in a 'lock-up' method according to the selected staking period and receive the set APY. The process is designed to ensure transparency and security of rewards.
Various reward options
Token and stablecoin rewards: Staking rewards can be paid in the platform's main token ($MMP) or stablecoins such as USDT/USDC.

Dual reward mechanism: Through strategic partnerships, users can receive additional rewards besides regular staking income. For example, if user A refers user B to stake, A receives a referral fee. If A is also staking, they receive dual rewards.
Early staking promotion: Early participants can receive an additional 10~30% bonus for a limited time.

community.title: 3. Referral Program and Community Participation
items: Referral staking: Friend referral bonus: If a user invites a friend to stake, the referrer receives an additional 5~10% of the referred user's rewards. This expands the user network and encourages community participation.

Leaderboard and mini-games: Staker leaderboard: A ranking system based on staking amount and period is operated, and top stakers receive weekly or monthly rewards (e.g., 1st place staker receives 1,000 $MMP).
Mini-game 'Lucky Spin': When staking or unlocking 1,000 tokens, users get a chance to spin a roulette for random rewards.
community.summary: The staking program not only offers high APY rates but also creates a vibrant ecosystem through referrals and interactive activities. By combining various reward methods and innovative marketing strategies, it builds a loyal community and supports long-term platform growth.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: The MMPP token mining program is integrated into the project's official website and aims to create a fair and transparent token distribution environment within the community. The main goal is for users to earn points by performing various online activities and tasks, which can later be converted into MMPP tokens. This expands the ecosystem and promotes sustainable community participation and growth.

mining.title: 2.1 Mining Methods
items: Time-based mining: Users can earn MMPP tokens based on the time (minutes or hours) they are active on the website. The system records participation time and converts it into mining points.
Mission-based mining: In addition to daily activities, users can earn points by completing specific missions such as:
Daily check-in completed
Participating in surveys, mini-games, and other interactive activities
Sharing content on social media
Referral mining: When a user invites a new user to the platform, the inviter receives additional mining points. This helps expand the community and increase overall engagement.

points.title: 2.2 Point Calculation and Distribution
items: Point system: Each user activity, mission, or interaction is converted into mining points according to a preset ratio. This system is designed to ensure fairness and encourage continuous participation.
Conversion to MMPP tokens: Accumulated mining points are converted into MMPP tokens through a fixed exchange rate or an adjustable mechanism based on the project's governance model.
Limits and balancing: To maintain token stability, a daily mining limit per user may be set. The exchange rate may also be adjusted based on the total points accumulated in the system.

security.title: 3. Security and Anti-Fraud System
items: Monitoring and verification: The mining system uses advanced monitoring and verification tools to detect bots, abuse, and manipulation of mining points. These measures ensure fairness and transparency in token distribution.
Data protection: The latest security technologies are applied to protect personal information and user activity data. All transactions and interactions are securely recorded and stored.

roadmap.title: 4. Roadmap and Future Development Plan
items: Integration of new missions and activities: Regular updates introduce new and interesting missions to continuously encourage user participation.
UI/UX improvements: Website layout and interactive features are improved so users can easily check their progress and accumulated tokens.
Multi-channel partnerships: Collaboration with other projects is expanded to increase the utility of MMPP tokens and provide more reward opportunities to the community.
roadmap.summary: This mining program is more than just a token distribution tool; it is a key driver for increasing user interaction and leading the ecosystem's sustainable growth.

tutorial.title: 5.1 Tutorial
tutorial.overview: If you're having trouble purchasing MMPP tokens, please refer to this document. We solve common problems and guide you through a smooth purchase process with step-by-step instructions. To purchase MMPP tokens, you need USDC in your Solana wallet and SOL to pay for transaction fees.

usdc.title: 2. How to obtain USDC on Solana Mainnet to purchase MMPP tokens
items: USDC cross-network transfer (using DEX): Use a decentralized exchange (DEX) that supports bridges like Jupiter Aggregator. Connect your wallet and select the network of your current USDC as the 'departure network'. Select Solana Mainnet as the 'arrival network'. Enter the amount of USDC to transfer. Complete the transfer procedure according to the DEX screen instructions.

Transfer USDC from centralized exchange (CEX) to on-chain wallet: Select 'Withdraw' option from your exchange. Copy your Solana wallet address and paste it in the withdrawal address field. Select Solana as the chain type. Enter the amount of USDC to transfer and complete the verification process. Once the transaction is confirmed, USDC will be sent directly to your wallet.

Convert other coins to USDC on CEX: Select 'Convert' or 'Swap' function from the exchange. Choose your cryptocurrency and specify USDC as the target coin for conversion. Enter the amount to convert. Complete the conversion process according to the exchange instructions.

sol.title: 3. How to obtain SOL for transaction fees on Solana Mainnet
items: SOL transfer via DEX bridge: Connect your wallet to a DEX that supports SOL bridges (like Jupiter Aggregator). Set your current SOL network as the departure network and Solana Mainnet as the arrival network. Enter the amount of SOL to transfer. Complete the transfer procedure according to the screen instructions.

Transfer SOL from CEX to on-chain wallet: Select 'Withdraw' from the exchange. Copy your Solana wallet address and paste it in the withdrawal address field. Select Solana as the chain type. Enter the amount of SOL to transfer and complete the verification process. Once the transaction is confirmed, SOL will be deposited into your wallet.

staking.title: 4. How to stake MMPP tokens
items: Access staking page: Log into the MEMEPUMP dashboard or launch the official MEMEPUMP app and navigate to the staking section.
Enter amount: Enter the amount of MMPP tokens to stake. Detailed information such as expected rewards and duration will be displayed.
Confirm transaction: Approve the staking transaction through your connected wallet. Be sure to review the terms and transaction details before final confirmation.
Receive rewards: Once tokens are staked, you will receive rewards according to the platform's guidelines and unlock premium features.

roadmap.title: 5.2 Roadmap
roadmap.summary: MEMEPUMP project operates based on a dynamic phased roadmap aimed at continuous expansion of the ecosystem, integrating community feedback and promoting innovation. Below are our key milestone plans:

phases.title: Phase 1: Foundation Building and Launch Preparation (Q2 2025)
items: Protocol final development: Complete protocol development, smart contract audit, and user interface testing.
Whitepaper and community building: Publish whitepaper and establish official communication channels for early participants.
Pre-token distribution: Distribute seed round tokens and prepare for mainnet entry.

phases.title: Phase 2: Official Launch and Initial Growth (Q3 2025)
items: Mainnet launch: Officially launch MEMEPUMP platform on Solana mainnet.
Token distribution start: Begin vesting schedule and activate community rewards.
Initial market integration: List MMPP tokens on major DEXs and initiate strategic early partnerships.

phases.title: Phase 3: Ecosystem Expansion and Feature Enhancement (Q4 2025 ~ Q1 2026)
items: Liquidity and simulation feature expansion: Launch advanced liquidity provision features and integrated simulation modules to strengthen market activity.
Staking and premium service launch: Introduce staking features and open premium services and advanced analytics dashboard.
Global expansion: Expand marketing activities and strengthen global influence through additional partnerships.

phases.title: Phase 4: Decentralized Governance and Long-term Innovation (Q2 2026 onwards)
items: DAO transition: Gradually transition governance to a fully decentralized model enabling community-driven decision making.
Cross-chain integration: Explore cross-chain interoperability to secure diverse liquidity and broaden user accessibility.
Continuous feature enhancement: Periodically update cutting-edge features based on user feedback and market evolution.
Community-driven projects: Support community-centered projects and incentives to continuously strengthen the MEMEPUMP ecosystem.

roadmap.note: This roadmap may be adjusted based on market conditions, technological developments, and community opinions. We are always committed to building a safe, innovative, and user-centered platform.

audit.title: 5.3 Audit
audit.content: (‚Äª This section will be updated when the audit results are completed.)

sections.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
sections.content: By accessing MEMEPUMP (hereinafter 'Platform'), you are considered to have legally agreed to these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.

sections.title: Eligibility
items: Must be 18 years of age or older (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction).
Usage is restricted if residing in prohibited countries (see item 4).

sections.title: 2. Platform Services
items: Meme coin trading: Token swaps through integrated DEXs like Uniswap, Jupiter
Portfolio tracking: Blockchain-based asset holding status verification
Staking: Deposit tokens and earn rewards (conditions may change)
AI tools: Analysis, scam detection, trend alerts, etc.
sections.disclaimer: We only provide user interface. Actual interactions occur directly through smart contracts. We have no control over external protocols (wallets, DEXs, etc.).

sections.title: 3. Token (MMPP) Utility
items: Governance participation: Exercise voting rights on platform upgrades
Staking rewards: Earn fees and MMPP rewards when providing liquidity
Premium features: Unlock advanced analytics tools and features by staking tokens

sections.title: 4. Restricted Regions and Users
items: Restricted countries: United States, United Kingdom, China, Singapore, FATF blacklist countries
Restricted entities: Sanctioned individuals, minors, organizations or individuals violating local laws

sections.title: 5. User Responsibilities
items: Security: You must securely store your personal wallet keys. We cannot recover lost assets.
Compliance: Must comply with all relevant laws in your country of residence, and tax reporting is your responsibility.
Due diligence: Must conduct sufficient research before trading meme coins.
sections.prohibited: Prohibited activities: Fraud, market manipulation (e.g., pump and dump), illegal activities (money laundering, terrorist financing, etc.), exploiting platform vulnerabilities

sections.title: 6. Risk Factors and Disclaimers
items: Market volatility: Meme coins can lose 100% of their value in a short period.
No warranty: This platform is provided 'as is' and does not guarantee accuracy or uptime.
Third-party risks: Possibility of errors or hacking of external services like wallets, DEXs, oracles
sections.liability: We are not responsible for: Asset losses due to hacking, fraud, or user errors, indirect damages (e.g., loss of profits)

sections.title: 7. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on the platform (logos, code, UI, etc.) is owned by MEMEPUMP. Limited usage permission is granted for personal, non-commercial purposes only.

sections.title: 8. Service Termination
sections.content: The platform may suspend service access or terminate accounts without prior notice for terms of service violations.

sections.title: 9. Dispute Resolution
items: Arbitration: All disputes are resolved through BVI (British Virgin Islands) arbitration procedures, and class action lawsuits are not allowed.
Governing law: These terms are governed by BVI law.

sections.title: 10. Terms Modification
sections.content: The platform may modify terms at any time, and continued use after changes is considered agreement to the changes.

sections.title: Contact
sections.content: For questions, please contact us at: memepump@gmail.com

improvements.title: Improvements
items: Concise structure: Clear sections and bullet point composition
User-centered language: Minimized use of legal terminology
Enhanced risk disclosure: Clearly explains meme coin-specific risks
Regulatory compliance emphasis: Explicitly mentions DeFi-related legal issues

privacy.title: 5.5 Privacy Policy
privacy.overview: MEMEPUMP prioritizes user privacy and data security. This policy explains how the platform complies with global data protection standards and how we collect, utilize, and protect user data.

onchain.title: On-chain data:
onchain.content: Transaction history, wallet addresses, and token balances are recorded on the blockchain. This data is public but exists in anonymized form and cannot be altered.

offchain.title: Off-chain data:
offchain.content: For users participating in activities requiring identity verification such as whitelisted liquidity providers, we may collect personal information including identification documents, contact information, and verification documents. This is to comply with KYC/AML (Know Your Customer/Anti-Money Laundering) regulations.

analytics.title: Usage analytics data:
analytics.content: To improve user experience and optimize services, we collect non-identifiable usage pattern data to enhance platform performance.

sections.title: 2. Data Utilization
items: Platform security and regulatory compliance: Collected data is primarily used to maintain platform security, verify user identity when necessary, and comply with relevant regulatory requirements.
Service improvement: Based on user data, services are customized, problems are resolved, and overall functionality is enhanced while protecting personal information.
Communication: With user consent, collected contact information may be used to provide major updates, platform announcements, and customer support information.

sections.title: 3. Data Protection Measures
items: Encryption and secure storage: Sensitive off-chain data is encrypted and stored securely with access limited to authorized personnel only.
Asset separation management: On-chain assets and off-chain data are managed through multi-signature wallets and strict access controls with strong protection measures against unauthorized access.
Regulatory compliance: MEMEPUMP strictly complies with international data protection regulations such as GDPR and protects user rights and data integrity.

sections.title: 4. User Rights and Data Retention
items: Data access and modification: Users may request access to personal data we hold and request modifications if necessary.
Data retention: Personal information is retained only for the period necessary to achieve the purposes stated in this policy or as legally required, and is safely disposed of when no longer needed.
Policy changes: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time, and important changes will be announced through official channels.

privacy.contact: By using the MEMEPUMP platform, users are considered to have agreed to the contents stated in this privacy policy. For detailed information about data privacy or inquiries, please contact us at support@memepump.com

questions.question: Can anyone mint or burn MMPP tokens?
questions.answer: No. MMPP token minting and burning can only be performed by **approved Whitelisted Liquidity Providers (WLP)**. These providers must complete KYC and KYB verification procedures, which is a measure to ensure the platform's compliance and integrity. General users can freely purchase and trade MMPP tokens 24/7 on official exchanges.

questions.question: I want to purchase MMPP tokens in large quantities. Are there methods other than official exchanges?
questions.answer: Yes. For large-scale transactions, please contact us directly at the email below: üìß vip@memepump.com Our team will guide you through customized trading options tailored to your requirements.

questions.question: How are the platform's underlying assets protected?
questions.answer: All assets backing the MEMEPUMP ecosystem are protected through collaboration with **regulated licensed custodians** and top-tier MPC (Multi-Party Computation) wallet providers. These partners manage assets in isolated form completely separated from operating funds, equipped with multi-security structures meeting institutional-grade security standards.

questions.question: What happens when there are changes to the platform's underlying asset composition?
questions.answer: Changes in underlying asset composition such as liquidity pool rebalancing or asset weight adjustments are automatically reflected in the MMPP token mechanism. These updates are typically performed regularly on a monthly basis, and users need not take any separate action. The platform responds flexibly to changes while maintaining stability.

questions.question: How are service fees calculated?
questions.answer: The MEMEPUMP protocol charges a daily service fee of 0.01% based on underlying asset value. This fee is automatically calculated daily by smart contracts, maintaining complete transparency so users can verify and check the fee structure at any time.

questions.question: Where should I contact if I have additional questions or issues?
questions.answer: For detailed information, please refer to the official MEMEPUMP documentation, and for additional inquiries, please contact us anytime at support@memepump.com

mmpInfo.introductionDescription: The MemePump (MMP) project is a groundbreaking initiative in the world of cryptocurrency, particularly in the Web3 space and decentralized platforms, aimed at introducing a new type of liquidity token. MMP is not just a cryptocurrency; it is a tool for creating value and opportunities for the community, with the goal of building a sustainable and robust ecosystem. Developed on the Solana platform, MemePump seeks to transform how users interact and engage in the cryptocurrency space.
